body.name: Glass Pour Over Coffee Maker with Double-layer Stainless Steel Filter, Coffee Dripper, with Cork Lid, Leather Collar Holder, Best Gift Idea for Him or Her – Dad or Mom - 37 oz (7-Cup)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ☕ NEW UNIQUE FILTER DESIGN - the double filter is laser-cut with an additional mesh inside. Unlike paper filters which are a waste of money and rob you of coffee's natural essential oils, this will provide a clear rich tasting balanced Coffee. The curved flow channels will help you get optimal extraction.

☕ BOROSILICATE GLASS CARAFE - the carafe is made from borosilicate glass, which is resistant to thermal shock, it also does not absorb any odors, chemicals or residue. Giving you a fresh tasting Coffee every time
☕ CORK LID - the lid completely closes up the mouth of the carafe and helps keep the heat in. Made from high quality cork material it will prevent accidental spills.
☕ COLORFUL HEAT-RESISTANT COLLAR - the collar lets you hold the carafe and pour even while your Coffee is still piping hot.

☕ QUALITY GUARANTEED - create a delicious Coffee like a Pro, with our detailed Instructions and tips. For any defects in the materials or craftsmanship of any Osaka product, please contact our customer service team and we will be glad to assist you.
body.description: Get the perfect brew with Kavako. Brewing coffee is an art form, and it can be pretty challenging. We at Kavako would like to help you up, your coffee game. If you follow our instructions and tips, and with some practice, you should be brewing the perfect cup of coffee in no time. Impress yourself and your guests with an awesome tasting coffee every time. Sanjūsangen-dō is our Premium Pour Over Drip Carafe. Filter The double filter is laser-cut with an additional mesh filter inside. Unlike paper filters which are a waste of money and rob you of the essential oils naturally found in coffee, this filter will provide a clear rich tasting balanced coffee. Cork lid The lid completely covers the opening of the carafe and helps keep the heat in. Made from durable, quality cork it will prevent accidental spills. Please Note: the cork should not be immersed in water, but can be washed with lukewarm water. Borosilicate glass carafe The carafe is made from borosilicate glass, which is resistant to thermal shock, it also does not absorb any odors, chemicals or residue. Giving you a fresh tasting coffee every time you brew. The carafe has a 1.1 Liter capacity. Premium Leather Collar The 100% genuine leather collar is a sight to behold. Add class and style to your home with this beautiful set. Allows you to pour while the coffee is still piping hot, and can be removed easily to clean. “Kavako”who inspired us? Osaka, is a large city on the Japanese island of Honshu, and is known for its modern architecture, boisterous nightlife and delicious coffee shops. We were inspired by their coffee brewing techniques, and from that “Kavako Coffee” was born. Every one of our products will look good enough to display and will perform better than anything else. If you are not yet in love with the process of coffee-making, be prepared to be infatuated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, I typically am pretty critical on my reviews of products that I purchase. If they're good, I say so.And, if they're not good, look out because i tell the truth.This pour over is FANTASTIC. We just started using pour over coffee makers about 3 months ago and this thing is everything i thought it would be, and more. Super easy clean up....not staining the glass container with ugly coffee or water spots (like my old coffee maker carafe). Filter system works great and the taste is outstanding.We no longer use drip or other electric coffee makers since purchasing this....highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new obsession is coffee
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write reviews. I NEVER write reviews. But THIS RIGHT HERE whheeewww!!I’m not a coffee person but when I do drink it I’m very particular about what I like. I got this because I wanted a low tech option at the office…that and I didn’t want to share a keurig with anyone.The coffee is so potent using this. Equivalent to a French press BUT BETTER. It drips fast and it’s easy to use. To clean it I advise using a bottle cleaner. Also invest in biodegradable drip filters. The filter for this product is good. But I buy the filter inserts for easy clean up and to MAKE SURE I don’t get grinds in my coffee.This would make a great gift for coffee enthusiasts, campers, or those that appreciate low tech. Plus the design is stylish. I can’t wait to bring this to work and prop it up on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, works well, tastes great, real leather.
reviews.reviewText: Works well, tastes better than press.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better value than Chemix?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Obviously the most well known pour-over glass coffee maker is the Chemix, but I actually think this Kavako coffee maker is, dollar for dollar, a better value. First, it's beautifully made with thick glass carafe with a genuine leather collar, which I actually prefer over the wood collar that comes with the Chemix - I can see the leather aging nicely over time. Second, it comes with the stainless-steel dripper, which has very fine mesh filter. Although I think I may end up using a paper filter on top of the metal filter because I noticed it filters out the coffee way too fast. Third, it's close to $10-20 cheaper than the comparable Chemix, and hey, who doesn't like saving money? I guess only little thing I would point out is that just like with any pour-over coffee maker of this shape, it's harder to clean the inside without having some sort of a bendable brush that reach the inside. Overall, I definitely recommend it for anyone who enjoys a rich flavorful coffee in the morning or anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Weird filter sizing but nice carafe
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t fit the chemex filter very well but it’s sturdy and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, simple and high quality.
reviews.reviewText: This pour over set is perfect for my needs. I have a very small kitchen and wanted to make a coffee & tea area in my dining room to save my limited counter space.The filter is high quality and has produced smooth coffee consistently for the few days I’ve used it.I recommend using a coarse grind if you’re having an issue with grounds getting stuck in the filter.I love the simplicity and cleaning is a breeze, everything easily rinses out. I saw the cork didn’t fit well in other reviews but mine fits great. I like the leather grip, it easily snaps on and off and fits securely. It feels high quality and adds a nice flair.Combined with an electric kettle I also bought on Amazon, I have fresh coffee in under 5 minutes that’s actually kind of fun to make.This set up is pretty enough to leave out, and if it holds up, the purchase was well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very functional and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This product makes my morning routine of making pour over coffee much more satisfying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used a pour over coffee system for a few years and have also tried many filters over that time.Every filter made quick work of filtering coffee for the start of my day.Not all did it well. I expected to replace after time the filter where it's used every day but not several times a year.This filter is the only one I reorder. It leaves NO sediment at the bottom of the pot. That's rare. Makes quick work of filtering and if (a quick learning process) I clean the filter after every use with a brush and soak once a month in vinegar/water, dawn over night, this filter might even last a year. I am currently still using one bought May '23. That's a great product!
